text: merata sitina kandayama eewa labagena rata pura bedaharima sidu kara thibe. ehidi wisheshayen pakisthan kudu jawaram jalaye shri lankika kotaskaruwan pilibanda siyalu thorathuru anawaranaya wi atha.merata mathdrawya nashaka anshaya me wana witath ema kotaskaruwan athadanguwata ganimata awashya parikshana aarambha kara thibe.wideshagathawa sitina shri lankika kotaskaruwan athadanguwata ganimata jathyanthara polis mathdrawya nashaka ansha wetha rathu niwedanayak da kara thibe.pasugiya agosthu 31 wanida reguwa mangin athadanguwata gath kilo 265kin samanwitha kudu kantenaraya merata genaeema eeta pasu layibiriyan kudu jawaramkaru athadanguwata ganima, hikkaduwedi athadanguwata gath kudu kilo 10 athulu me wasara thula soyagath heroyin jawaram gananawakata sambandha pakisthan shri lankika kudu jawaramkaruwan gana me wana wita thorathuru rasak heliwi thibe.

me kathawa siddha wennne guruwarayekuta.mama danna widihatanam wishwa widyalayaka uganwana guruwarayekuta.me guruwarayage golayek innawa.me golaya guruwarayata guruwarayagema daruwek widihata thamayi hitiye.guruwarayath me tharunayata salakuwe thamangema daruwekuta wada aadarayen.eka kalekadi me tharuna shishyaya ganu lamayek samaga aadara sabandathawayak patangannawa.kohomin kohoma hari me guruwarayath me sambandhaya gana danagena ee dennata udaw karamin innawa.kalayak gathawimen pasuwa me tharuna yuwala ema widyalayen ho wishwawidyalayen thamange adhyapana katayuthu awasan karala ema sthanayen nikma yanawa.
